overview: In no particular time and space, a family fabricates goat cheese. The mother and the daughter pretend to sell the cheese in a lonely road, but they are really selling their bodies. They leave the hard worked cheese to decay in a pile of dirt and rot. The mother encounters existential desperation when the daughter departs with a costumer and the father prefers the company of the goats.

production_companies.name: Escuela Internacional de Cine y Televisión de San Antonio de los Baños

title: Queso de cabra
